hero_desc: A secondary institution dedicated to academic excellence, character development, and community leadership through holistic education and disciplined growth.
foundation_desc: Established to serve the region's educational needs with integrity and vision.
history_text: Bugisu High School stands as a pillar of education in our community. We provide a structured environment where students are challenged intellectually and supported personally. Our approach balances rigorous academics with a rich extracurricular program to ensure every student graduates with both knowledge and character.
mission_desc: To nurture students through a holistic curriculum that fosters intellectual growth, moral integrity, and social responsibility.
vision_desc: To be the premier institution of learning where every student discovers their potential and strives for excellence.

values.excellence_desc: Striving for the highest standards in all academic and personal pursuits.
values.integrity_desc: Acting with honesty and strong moral principles in every situation.
values.discipline_desc: Maintaining self-control and focus to achieve long-term goals.
values.community_desc: Fostering a sense of belonging and responsibility toward others.

leadership_desc: Guided by experienced educators committed to student success.
leadership_fallback_bio: Part of the dedicated leadership at Bugisu High School.
team_desc: The dedicated faculty inspiring our students to achieve their best.
